component.name: OpenMS
component.summary: Mass spectrometry (MS) software for Proteomics and Metabolomics

description.p: OpenMS is a powerful set of tools as well as a C++ library to process low and high-resolution LC-MS(-MS) mass spectrometry data.

OpenMS is modular, consisting of more than 80 chainable tools (executables). It features a graphical data viewer (TOPPView), a pipeline editor (TOPPAS) and wrappers for most tandem-MS search engines (like Mascot, MSGF+ and X!Tandem). The OpenMS library itself comes with Python bindings for rapid prototyping.

screenshot.caption: TOPPView is a viewer for MS and HPLC-MS data supporting many common formats, e.g. mzML, mzData, mzXML and several others. The figure shows two instances of TOPPView displaying a HPLC-MS map and a MS raw spectrum.
A simple example pipeline created in TOPPAS and successfully executed.
